Oh that?  Some say that they reduced friction to stop rovers from rolling over so easily.  This results in rockets sliding down slight slopes and planes rotating like that.

Click on the landing gear and enable "friction" then crank it up until the plane stops rotating.  Or just set it to the maximum. 

Also, there is a mod called "parking break" that works pretty well.  It does not stop the rotation completely but does almost stop it.
